summary: Provides a Home Assistant integration for Telegram bots, managing configuration, authentication, and communication with the Telegram API. It enables sending notifications, files, locations, and media, supports broadcasting messages, handles incoming updates via asynchronous polling or webhook endpoints, and offers services to edit, delete, and respond to messages and callbacks.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users to receive and send Telegram messages for alerts, automation feedback, and interactive control, facilitating seamless two-way communication between the home automation platform and Telegram users.
